posts.post_content:
Up for sale here we have 3 t206 hofers... prices are delivered with confirmation... 
1-nap lajoie portrait, soveriegn 150 green apple back. the card has obvious issues and would probably grade a 1, but has excellent eye appeal & is an affordable low grade example of one of the all time greats-$125

2-Rube Waddell Pitching Piedmont 150-Card has light wrinkling and would probably grade fair, but has bold colors and wonderful appeal-$85

3-Rube Waddel Portrait Piedmont 150-SGC 10, nice looking card of this nutter! would have probably bumped a grade if not for light paperloss on the reverse-$75 

Please pm me or email me (sportsjerseys78@gmail.com) if you are interested or wold like to see better scans 

Happy Collecting! 
David

$Sold for the lajoie (Thanks Craig!) 
75 for the waddell throwing
65 for the waddell port 


Open to trades... always interested in autographed cuts, 3x5's and the like...
Have had very successful dealing with Dave and recommend him.  Good luck on your sale!

[quote name="bbcard1" post=1015694]Have had very successful dealing with Dave and recommend him.  Good luck on your sale![/QUOTE]

Me too! VERY TOP NOTCH!!!
Thanks for the kind words guys!

And a thought/some advice?--
I'd edit/show the reduction in price in your original/initial post, Dave.
As a reader, I sometimes don't go beyond that,
so, as it is, I might not realize that you're actually selling these for a substantially reduced rate.
But then again, what do I know?

Yours,

Doug

Friendly bump to say Lajoie arrived quickly and safely and the transaction was smooth  :)

Thanks again and best regards,

Craig
